description:
Push your winter workouts in the track or on the pavement. This insulated softshell keeps you warm and protected during sweaty pursuits on the coldest days. Windproof and waterproof fabric sheds gusts and flurries, while insulated panels hold in your body heat where you need it. The 37.5® liner technology moves sweat away to keep you dry and prevent chills.

  • R-Wind softshell with 2.5-layer waterproof-breathable laminate provides wind and water protection
  • Synthetic insulation in chest keeps your core warm
  • 37.5® technology is highly wicking to keep you dry during intense activity
  • Stretch cuffs and adjustable hem seal out drafts
  • Headphone loop on collar keeps cords in control while you workout
  • Close fitting design for unrestricted movement
name: Rossignol Poursuite Warm Jacket - Men's
